message.content:
1. Intensive care unit (ICU) environmental factors can cause sleep deprivation in critically ill patients.
2. Noise is an environmental factor in the ICU.
3. Light is an environmental factor in the ICU.
4. Critically ill patients can experience sleep deprivation in the ICU.

messages.content:
Statement: Intensive care unit (ICU) environmental factors such as noise and light have been cited as important causes of sleep deprivation in critically ill patients.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
